Title: Discourse on the Origin of Inequality.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Jean-Jacques Rousseau.
Categories: Philosophy.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=UNooAwAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: A strikingly original inquiry into politics and human nature, the Discourse presents a theoretical view of people in a pre-social condition and the ensuing effects of civilization. The author develops a theory of evolution that prefigures Darwinism and encompasses aspects of ethics, sociology, and epistemology. One of the most influential works of the Enlightenment..
